Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Hello everyone!  Payportal team is very appreciate efforts of everyone who participated in PPTL ICO promotion and believes in Payportal project and team. Special thanks to our brilliant advisors who generously shared their knowledge, time, enthusiasm, business and human skills. We appreciate and thanks our Bounty manager and all members of our bounty community for your job, efforts, interesting comments and your support.   Sorry but ICO did not achieve the softcap and will be closed.  As it was defined in the contract, investments will be returned, tokens will be burned. We all did our best but bear market trend didn’t allow to gain the aim of ICO, sorry.  Now Payportal is looking for a strategic shareholding partner with total investment amount around 2 mln usd for further development of the Payportal. Please don’t write off the scrap, follow Payportal timeline and collaborate in case of future digital marketing events.   Thanks a lot once more. Good day and good luck in your business.

Author: SanniBis
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Hey Payportal Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Payportal”) is a privately-owned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry since 1996.  The Payportal establishes a connection between service providers and their customers by processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers in the most secure and convenient way through a Payportal wallet.  The business area of our Company is Delhi where we successfully manage 80 distributors and 2300 retailers. The Payportal team has grown to over 20 people with the most in sales. During 2017 Payportal has processed around 500 million rupees in payments that was 45% higher comparing to 2016.

Author: SanniBis
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market. Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi. Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area. Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc. Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform. Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority.

Author: SanniBis
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.  Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.  All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities. Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: qilabylege
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Hey. Tell us about the project.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The Payportal platform connects Indian service providers such as banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a WALLET. A wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the owner.  Retailers use Payportal wallet to satisfy walk-in customers’ requests to make bill payments, recharges and domestic money transfers pan India in easy and secure way. On-line customers enjoy all wallet features remotely.  The platform is utilizing the advantages of personal computers and smart phones. Customers and Retailers can access wallet services at the secure web page through the standard web browsers https://mob.payportal.in or benefit IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play.

Author: qilabylege
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: What business model is planned?

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market. Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi. Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area. Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc. Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform. Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority

Author: qilabylege
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Tell us about The Blockchain

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.  Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.  All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities. Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: qilabylege
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Tell us about Token and capitalization

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity.  Token distribution Total PPTL Token supply is 20 000 000 We accept ETH 1 Token = 0,002 ETH SOFTCAP: 3000 ETH, HARDCAP: 24 000 ETH  70% of the tokens allocated to the investors (14,500,000 PPTL) 15% for rewarding team and advisors 5% is used on Bounty program and marketing 10% for company reserve

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Advisors Simon Cocking Senior Editor at Irish Tech News - with over 710,000 unique monthly views, Editor in Chief at CryptoCoinNews, and freelances for Sunday Business Post, Irish Times, Southern Star, IBM, G+D, and others. Simon is a top ranked member of the ‘People of Blockchain’ (currently ranked at #1 / 18,000). He is also a business mentor and advisor working with 100+ successful ICOs to date. He also been named many global Twitter influencer lists in the last 12 months. He is an accomplished public speaker at events including TEDx, Web Summit, Dublin Tech Summit, and overseas in Dubai, Singapore, Moscow, Tel Aviv, Madrid, Tbilisi, Riga, Porto, Dublin and Helsinki in the last 12 months. Simon has been based in Ireland for over 22 years and has cofounded or founded seven successful companies. Daniel Heller Regulatory Affairs Daniel has been associated with the Peterson Institute for International Economics since January 2017 as a visiting fellow. Before joining the Institute, he was head of financial stability at the Swiss National Bank, head of the Secretariat of the Committee on Payment and Settlement Systems at the Bank for International Settlements, and executive director for Switzerland, Poland, Serbia, Azerbaijan, and four Central Asian republics at the International Monetary Fund. Daniel received his PhD from the University of Bern and was a research fellow at Stanford University. His current research focuses on the impact of emerging digital technologies such as blockchain on the financial sector, financial stability, and central banking. Irina Travina A Chairman of Russian software developers’ Association “SibAcademSoft” http://sibakademsoft.com A member of Supervisory and Expert Council of the «Technopark of Novosibirsk Academgorodok» https://academpark.com/en A member of strategic planning group of the Novosibirsk State University https://english.nsu.ru A member of the Coordinating Council on Information Resources, Technologies and Communication at the International Association “Siberian Accord” http://www.sibacc.ru/en Co-founder of the internationally known developer company of computer games and simulators «SoftLab-NSK» LLP. Computer games Hard Truck, Hard Truck-2 and Hard Truck-3 according to the Next Generation web portal rating in 2006 become the first Russian project in the top 100 best selling games of the XXI century. The company develops and produces own solutions for automation of TV, cable and internet broadcasting. More than 2500 TV studios and internet providers from Russia and abroad have selected the solutions for Digital TV. Michael E. Bryant, MA, MBA, CPA, CBE Chairman of the Advisory Board Michael is the CEO of Blockchain Ventures International, CEO of ICO Management Ltd, CEO & Publisher of “Blockchain Daily News” (www.blockchainChimp.com), Executive Member of The Blockchain Council, and President of Bryant Trust Ltd. He additionally serves as the Chairman of the Advisory Boards for the Digital Currency (DCC) ICO, the Greek Food Corridors (GFC) ICO, the Cargo Coin (CRGO) ICO, and the Decibels (DCBL) ICO, as well as an Advisory Board member for the IPCHAIN Database (IP) ICO, the Double land game ICO, the Lightcash ICO, and the Bbiller ICO. Michael serves as an Adjunct Professor of “International Accounting” and “International Corporate Finance” in the Masters in International Business program at Moscow’s Higher School of Economics, and as a guest lecturer on Blockchain Technology and Cryptocurrencies at the Moscow University of Finance & Law (MFUA). In addition to acquiring eleven late stage companies during his career, with revenues ranging from $2 million to $120 million, Michael was the founder of six startup companies, with activities ranging from 4-D Printing and online mining supply, to Education & Training and Musician Promotion. He is a Certified Public Accountant (CPA), and a Certified Blockchain Expert (CBE). Michael began his career in 1982 with a BSc. in Finance & Accounting from the University of South Carolina, after serving as a White House Intern in the Ronald Reagan administration. During his career he furthered his education by earning a MBA in International Business from Georgia State University, and a MA in International Relations from The Fletcher School of Law & Diplomacy at Harvard University and Tufts University.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: This money manager is going all in on India becoming a $5 trillion economy in 6 years  Factors beyond India’s control have been roiling its financial markets in recent months, as a spike in global crude oil price and the resultant rise in inflation and winding up of loose money policies by central banks have hurt market outlook.  But Sunil Singhania, one of Dalal Street’s most outstanding money managers, wants to look at the brighter side of things.  The size of India’s economy will double from $2.5 trillion today to $5 trillion by 2025; that is, in six years from now. That’s the opportunity to capture, says he.  Read full article --HERE--

Simon has been based in Ireland for over 22 years and has cofounded or founded seven successful companies. Daniel Heller Regulatory Affairs Daniel has been associated with the Peterson Institute for International Economics since January 2017 as a visiting fellow. Before joining the Institute, he was head of financial stability at the Swiss National Bank, head of the Secretariat of the Committee on Payment and Settlement Systems at the Bank for International Settlements, and executive director for Switzerland, Poland, Serbia, Azerbaijan, and four Central Asian republics at the International Monetary Fund. Daniel received his PhD from the University of Bern and was a research fellow at Stanford University. His current research focuses on the impact of emerging digital technologies such as blockchain on the financial sector, financial stability, and central banking. Irina Travina A Chairman of Russian software developers’ Association “SibAcademSoft” http://sibakademsoft.com A member of Supervisory and Expert Council of the «Technopark of Novosibirsk Academgorodok» https://academpark.com/en A member of strategic planning group of the Novosibirsk State University https://english.nsu.ru A member of the Coordinating Council on Information Resources, Technologies and Communication at the International Association “Siberian Accord” http://www.sibacc.ru/en Co-founder of the internationally known developer company of computer games and simulators «SoftLab-NSK» LLP. Computer games Hard Truck, Hard Truck-2 and Hard Truck-3 according to the Next Generation web portal rating in 2006 become the first Russian project in the top 100 best selling games of the XXI century. The company develops and produces own solutions for automation of TV, cable and internet broadcasting. More than 2500 TV studios and internet providers from Russia and abroad have selected the solutions for Digital TV. Michael E. Bryant, MA, MBA, CPA, CBE Chairman of the Advisory Board Michael is the CEO of Blockchain Ventures International, CEO of ICO Management Ltd, CEO & Publisher of “Blockchain Daily News” (www.blockchainChimp.com), Executive Member of The Blockchain Council, and President of Bryant Trust Ltd. He additionally serves as the Chairman of the Advisory Boards for the Digital Currency (DCC) ICO, the Greek Food Corridors (GFC) ICO, the Cargo Coin (CRGO) ICO, and the Decibels (DCBL) ICO, as well as an Advisory Board member for the IPCHAIN Database (IP) ICO, the Double land game ICO, the Lightcash ICO, and the Bbiller ICO. Michael serves as an Adjunct Professor of “International Accounting” and “International Corporate Finance” in the Masters in International Business program at Moscow’s Higher School of Economics, and as a guest lecturer on Blockchain Technology and Cryptocurrencies at the Moscow University of Finance & Law (MFUA). In addition to acquiring eleven late stage companies during his career, with revenues ranging from $2 million to $120 million, Michael was the founder of six startup companies, with activities ranging from 4-D Printing and online mining supply, to Education & Training and Musician Promotion. He is a Certified Public Accountant (CPA), and a Certified Blockchain Expert (CBE). Michael began his career in 1982 with a BSc. in Finance & Accounting from the University of South Carolina, after serving as a White House Intern in the Ronald Reagan administration. During his career he furthered his education by earning a MBA in International Business from Georgia State University, and a MA in International Relations from The Fletcher School of Law & Diplomacy at Harvard University and Tufts University.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Tell us about the business model

Author: SanniBis
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market. Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi. Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area. Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc. Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform. Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority.

Author: JackiLins
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Tell us about the  The Blockchain

Author: SanniBis
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.  Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.  All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities. Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: At PayPortal our endeavour has always been to ensure that our customers can transact with utmost ease, speed and complete assurance of safety and this has led us to adopt the blockchain technology.  The concept of blockchain is bringing a revolution to the financial services industry globally and PayPortal is also evolving itself around this technology. Server decentralization, a key aspect of this technology will keep wallet data safe in case of hardware failure or hacking attacks.

Author: SanniBis
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The Payportal receives a commission from mobile and TV operators, banks and other partners that are partly shared between distributors and retailers. Transaction based surcharges and monthly fees apply to retailers and partly to on-line customers. Increase in the number of service providers, retailers and on-line customers leads to the increase of a revenue. Geographical expansion and increasing the number of retailers and distributors are crucial for the exponential revenue growth.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: With a population of close to 1.2 billion, India presents a vast, growing and dynamic market. The extent of the FinTech market can be imagined by a simple figure of bill payment, where more than 30 billion bills are paid every year with a value of more than 100 billion dollars. Since even now close to 70% of these bills are being paid in cash, there is a huge scope of FinTech which encourages and eases digital payments.  Currently, there are certain challenges being faced by customers in the payment and financial sector including  lack of single platforms for paying all utility bills, even when certain distributors or retailers provide these services, there is a high chance of stealing of the cash collected from customers due to lack of proper organizations and it being an individual driven service offer. Certain other challenges that customers face include lack of safe methods of international remittance, time taking banking procedures and lack of professional customer support during payment processes.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: PayPortal Services is supporting India’s drive towards becoming a cash-less economy and offering a secure and convenient option for a variety of financial transactions for our customers and partners.  PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry.  It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer. PayPortal’s centralized platform connects service providers including banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with the public through a wallet. PayPortal’s wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: PayPortal is making financial transactions easier and smoother by ensuring quick and safe recharges, money transfers and payments.  We are present through point of sale terminals, web as well as mobile apps for the ease and financial convenience of our customers and partners.  Our mission is to offer top-notch electronic payment solutions to our customers across the value chain. We consistently work towards making a difference in the daily life of our end users by providing seamless services, ease of use through a single window payment option and complete customer satisfaction.

Body: Hey. Tell us about the business model

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Hello. In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market. Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi. Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area. Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc. Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform. Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority.

Author: vova1548
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Please tell us about your The Blockchain

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.  Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.  All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities. Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: India has a diversified financial sector undergoing rapid expansion. Various reforms introduced by the Government of India to liberalise, regulate and enhance this industry have supported this growth.  Traditionally, Fin Tech space could not keep up with the innovations because it was to some extent held back by regulatory uncertainties and a conservative approach on the part of regulatory bodies. Also, generally the incumbent financial institutions also opted for slow and steady improvements as opposed to disruptive innovations.  read full article --HERE--

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: With a population of close to 1.2 billion, India presents a vast, growing and dynamic market. The extent of the FinTech market can be imagined by a simple figure of bill payment, where more than 30 billion bills are paid every year with a value of more than 100 billion dollars. Since even now close to 70% of these bills are being paid in cash, there is a huge scope of FinTech which encourages and eases digital payments.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Steve Jobs had famously remarked that innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. s.  PayPortal Services (P) Limited is leading the efforts of Indian Fintech industry towards safer, faster, transparent and more efficient payment systems for the ease of end customers through innovative solutions and technologies..  PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer.  PayPortal has always dared to experiment and innovate being on the fore front of innovation and out of the box thinking to ensure that we are able to serve our customers better, faster and more efficiently. The organization  also believe that combined with new technology, an organization needs a completely new mode of thinking that puts customer trust at the center of the entire organization, which translates to unwavering loyalty and sustainable profits.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: PayPortal is making financial transactions easier and smoother by ensuring quick and safe recharges, money transfers and payments. We are present through point of sale terminals, web as well as mobile apps for the ease and financial convenience of our customers and partners.   Our mission is to offer top-notch electronic payment solutions to our customers across the value chain. We consistently work towards making a difference in the daily life of our end users by providing seamless services, ease of use through a single window payment option and complete customer satisfaction.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Leveraging the deep experience in banking, payments processing, telecom and information technology of its management team, PayPortal has established itself firmly as a service provider with wide coverage in its areas of operations.  Our team of uniquely skilled professionals strives to make digital payments option accessible to every customer and ensure higher profitability for them through our efficient networks and achieving economies of scale. The team brings a cumulative experience of more than five decades, expertise from national and international markets as well as a history of success in large scale financial projects.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: At PayPortal our endeavour has always been to ensure that our customers can transact with utmost ease, speed and complete assurance of safety and this has led us to adopt the blockchain technology. The concept of blockchain is bringing a revolution to the financial services industry globally and PayPortal is also evolving itself around this technology.  Server decentralization, a key aspect of this technology will keep wallet data safe in case of hardware failure or hacking attacks. PayPortal has now become a pioneer amongst its peers by implementing a cross border money transfer service based on block chain to provide ease of money transfers between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. With our advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we will be ensuring the fast and safe international transfers through our own block chain and crypto currency PPTL Coin.  The PPTL coins will be internationally acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.

Author: vova1548
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Tell us about the business model

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market. Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi. Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area. Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc. Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform. Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority.

Author: vova1548
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Tell us about the Blockchain

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.  Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.  All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities. Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The Payportal receives a commission from mobile and TV operators, banks and other partners that are partly shared between distributors and retailers. Transaction based surcharges and monthly fees apply to retailers and partly to on-line customers. Increase in the number of service providers, retailers and on-line customers leads to the increase of a revenue. Geographical expansion and increasing the number of retailers and distributors are crucial for the exponential revenue growth.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity. Token distribution Total PPTL Token supply is 20 000 000 We accept ETH 1 Token = 0,002 ETH SOFTCAP: 3000 ETH, HARDCAP: 24 000 ETH 70% of the tokens allocated to the investors (14,500,000 PPTL)  15% for rewarding team and advisors  5% is used on Bounty program and marketing  10% for company reserve

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A recent TechSci Research report titled “India Mobile Wallet Market Opportunities and Forecast, 2020”, projects that the mobile wallet market in India will grow to $ 6.6 billion by 2020. The increasing penetration of smart phones, a growing internet base as well as regulatory support has created conditions which are ripe for exponential growth of the mobile wallet market.  PayPortal Services is supporting India’s drive towards becoming a cash-less economy and offering a secure and convenient option for a variety of financial transactions for our customers and partners. PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer. PayPortal’s centralized platform connects service providers including banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with the public through a wallet. PayPortal’s wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner.

Body: Payportal Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Payportal”) is a privatelyowned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry since 1996. The Payportal establishes relations between service providers and their customers by processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers in the most secure and convenient way through a Payportal wallet. The business area of our Company is Delhi where we successfully manage 80 distributors and 2300 retailers. The Payportal team has grown to over 20 people with the most in sales. During 2017 Payportal has processed around 500 million rupees in payments that was 45% higher comparing to 2016.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: India has a diversified financial sector undergoing rapid expansion. Various reforms introduced by the Government of India to liberalise, regulate and enhance this industry have supported this growth.  Traditionally, Fin Tech space could not keep up with the innovations because it was to some extent held back by regulatory uncertainties and a conservative approach on the part of regulatory bodies. Also generally the incumbent financial institutions also opted for slow and steady improvements as opposed to disruptive innovations.  However, over the past couple of years, a paradigm shift in these perspectives is being observed in the country. Latest technologies are enabling significantly more transparency in financial systems, and regulatory authorities are becoming more open to adoption of these technologies.  The government’s efforts towards promoting digitisation of financial systems and reducing cash transactions in the economy have also been successful in shifting consumer focus towards digital alternatives for financial transactions and this has translated to the most benefit for the payments sector.  As per a PWC’s FinTech Trends Report 2017 Overall, India offers the highest expected return on investment on FinTech projects at 29% versus a global average of 20%.  With a population of close to 1.2 billion, India presents a vast, growing and dynamic market. The extent of the FinTech market can be imagined by a simple figure of bill payment, where more than 30 billion bills are paid every year with a value of more than 100 billion dollars. Since even now close to 70% of these bills are being paid in cash, there is a huge scope of FinTech which encourages and eases digital payments.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Currently, there are certain challenges in India being faced by customers in the payment and financial sector including  lack of single platforms for paying all utility bills, even when certain distributors or retailers provide these services, there is a high chance of stealing of the cash collected from customers due to lack of proper organizations and it being an individual driven service offer. Certain other challenges that customers face include lack of safe methods of international remittance, time taking banking procedures and lack of professional customer support during payment processes.  PayPortal is creating customer delight through making financial transactions easier and smoother by ensuring quick and safe recharges, money transfers and payments. PayPortal has adopted the blockchain technologies as one of the most important aspects of further development of its digital payments platform.  A key benefit of adopting blockchain technology will be server decentralization, which will keep the mobile wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.   Also PayPortal will be implementing a cross border money transfer’s service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country through the same concept

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: “Never before in history has innovation offered promise of so much to so many in so short a time."   These words by Bill Gates hold so true for innovation and adoption of blockchain technology. The famous author of  Wikinomics, Tapscott writes extensively about  how the blockchain technology is ushering in a profound technological shift that will change how the world does business and so much more. And the academicians and technology experts are not just talking about the revolution that adoption of this technology is bringing about; businesses are actually researching, innovating and adopting this technology in the real world to get authentic benefit.  The blockchain technology makes peer-to-peer transactions possible, avoiding the need of intermediaries while ensuring that the user’s information remains protected. The blockchain ensures the transactions are validated and a permanent, immutable record of all transactions is maintained; protecting users against frauds, hack attacks etc. It is no wonder the leading industries are adopting this technology.  While there is so much happening in the world of Fintech around the world, India is for sure not lagging behind. Many independent players in India are adopting the technology to provide fast, smart and reliable payment services to their customers. An organization which is working towards revolutionizing the payment ecosystem in the country through innovation and new technologies is PayPortal.  Established by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry, PayPortal is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer.  Presale is on https://ico.payportal.in

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: 1. Yes, Payportal is different. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.  2. Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Steve Jobs had famously remarked that innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. s.  PayPortal Services (P) Limited is leading the efforts of Indian Fintech industry towards safer, faster, transparent and more efficient payment systems for the ease of end customers through innovative solutions and technologies..  PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer.  PayPortal has always dared to experiment and innovate being on the fore front of innovation and out of the box thinking to ensure that we are able to serve our customers better, faster and more efficiently. The organization  also believe that combined with new technology, an organization needs a completely new mode of thinking that puts customer trust at the center of the entire organization, which translates to unwavering loyalty and sustainable profits.

Leveraging the deep experience in banking, payments processing, telecom and information technology of its management team, PayPortal has established itself firmly as a service provider with wide coverage in its areas of operations.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Being in sync with the customer needs and latest technologies in offer has ensured that PayPortal has become one of the pioneers in Indian Fintech space to leverage the blockchain technology for strengthening overall systems and implementing a cross border money transfer service between Indian immigrants living broad and their families in home country. The technology will also help in data decentralization and thus higher data security. Latest news from the telecom sector confirms that top Indian telecom operators such as   Bharti Airtel , Vodafone India and Reliance Jio Infocomm  are evaluating the deployment of blockchain technology-based platforms to create new revenue streams. Jio is especially using a start-up accelerator, Jio-GenNext to access innovations from block-chain related start-ups and has also deployed an engineering team to work on the technology with the goal of developing new use case and applications. Vodafone India is also working with IBM in blockchain technology and is supposedly at the proof of concept (PoC) stage while Airtel is doing initial trials in the technology.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.  Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.  All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities. Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity. Token distribution Total PPTL Token supply is 20 000 000 We accept ETH 1 Token = 0,002 ETH SOFTCAP: 3000 ETH, HARDCAP: 24 000 ETH  70% of the tokens allocated to the investors (14,500,000 PPTL)  15% for rewarding team and advisors  5% is used on Bounty program and marketing  10% for company reserve

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: PayPortal : Making its contribution towards a stronger Fintech  industry in India  India is a fast growing economy with more than a billion mobile connections and a smart phone user base that’s poised to hit 530 million in 2018.  India is also characterized by an increase in internet penetration and broadband speed combined with the fact that the vast majority of population is young, with millenials being the largest demographic group.  The younger population is moving beyond the legacy system of money management such as traditional banks and increasingly managing money online through wallets and digital means. These conditions are ripe for further development of fintech ecosystem in the country. The legal and regulatory support extended by the Indian government to this sector in form of enabling policies and innovations is contributing to the growth of this Industry in the country.  The regulatory bodies are committed to making finance digitised and accessible for the masses.  As part of its Digital India initiative, government of India is encouraging a paperless and cashless model of finance, which helps in increasing financial inclusion, reducing paperwork, fraud and bureaucracy, improving efficiencies, and reducing costs. FISME, the leading federation of MSMEs, recently submitted a set of suggestions to the Government for promotion of Fintech Industry,  in response to the invitation by a  Steering Committee constituted by the Government to develop a support eco- system for the sector. This growth and innovation in the Fintech sector in the country is ably supported by private organizations. One such organization working specially in the northern parts of the country is PayPortal Services Private Limited. PayPortal is a privately owned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry for more than two decades.   Payportal’s innovative and technically sound centralized platform connects Indian service providers like banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a wallet. Payportal wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner. It only takes a few seconds to set up a wallet and two factors authentication process ensures that the customer is exactly the person who owns the wallet and offers a safe and secure payment method. The PayPortal platform utilizes the advantages of personal computers and smart phones and is available on a secure web page (mob.payportal.in) that has been designed for personal computers and mobile browsers as well. While most companies in the current payments landscape are either focussed on remittances or money transfer; PayPortal is introducing innovative technologies such as blockchain for making its data decentralized and payment systems more secure.  The company is working towards its vision of providing an innovative and seamless single window payment solution to its customers through an extensive network of channel partners including distributors and retailers. PayPortal is a pioneer in the Indian market to look towards introducing blockchain technology and international payment solutions.  With its advanced experience in domestic money transfers, the company plans to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. The PPTL pre sale is already underway and is getting very positive response from investors. PayPortal is committed to work towards empowering its end customers by making their experience in bill payments and money transfers easy, smart and faster.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Hey, Thanks.  Payportal is different. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.  2. Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The latest news coming out from financial quarters is that the Incian government is expected to come out with a framework to regulate crypto currencies soon. The government has already constituted a committee headed by Ajeet Khurana to study the impact of crypto currencies and to make recommendations to regulate them. As per Mr Khurana, unlike other industries where significant efforts are needed for growth and at times signs may even be worrisome, cryptocurrency business growth is happening on its own. As an industry the cryptocurrency market in India is also coming out with a course and certifications which will help customers get a better understanding of the product and the risk associated with it. The known crypto exchanges have been using expensive risk management and KYC management software which the top banks deploy. As per the latest budget speech of Indian Finance Minister Arun Jaitley the Indian government will also explore the use of the blockchain technology proactively for ushering in a digital economy.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: It appears that the government of India is not banning cryptocurrencies, instead contemplating taxing them.  The government is considering a proposal to lay an 18-percent Goods and Services Tax (GST) on the trading of the cryptocurrencies, Bloomberg reports.  The proposal is currently being evaluated by the Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (the national agency responsible for GST), and will be presented to the GST council when the draft has been finalized.  The government may levy the GST on cryptocurrency retrospectively from July 1, 2017 — when GST was implemented.  Government’s choice of GST is particularly interesting. The tax is levied on the sales of goods and services in India at every step in the production and supply chain, but it is only the final customer that bears the cost as all other people in the chain are refunded their tax. Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A recent TechSci Research report titled “India Mobile Wallet Market Opportunities and Forecast, 2020”, projects that the mobile wallet market in India will grow to $ 6.6 billion by 2020. The increasing penetration of smart phones, a growing internet base as well as regulatory support has created conditions which are ripe for exponential growth of the mobile wallet market. PayPortal Services is supporting India’s drive towards becoming a cash-less economy and offering a secure and convenient option for a variety of financial transactions for our customers and partners. PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer. PayPortal’s centralized platform connects service providers including banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with the public through a wallet. PayPortal’s wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market.  Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi.  Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area.  Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc.  Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform.  Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity. Token distribution  Total PPTL Token supply is 20 000 000 We accept ETH 1 Token = 0,002 ETH SOFTCAP: 3000 ETH,  HARDCAP: 24 000 ETH     70% of the tokens allocated to the investors (14,500,000 PPTL)  15% for rewarding team and advisors   5% is used on Bounty program and marketing   10% for company reserve

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.   Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.   Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.   All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities.     Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer. PayPortal’s centralized platform connects service providers including banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a wallet. The PayPortal wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner.  To further develop the existing PayPortal platforms, the developers have adopted the blockchain technology. Adoption of the technology will ensure that the trusted platform of PayPortal can help its customers embrace the blockchain technology for their day to day transactions. In the current system of cross-border payments, there are two key issues, which are the costs of transfers are very high, with intermediaries charging a steep fee and the time taken by transactions which are on average at least two to three business days. This is why PayPortal is leveraging the blockchain technology for implementing a cross border money transfer service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country.  With its advanced expertise in domestic money transfers, PayPortal plans to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin.  The PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In the system adopted by PayPortal, distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors will buy tokens in the OTC (over the counter) market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and PayPortal wallet number of a receiver. The PPTL value will be credited automatically to the wallet owner who continues to use PayPortal financial services.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Leveraging the deep experience in banking, payments processing, telecom and information technology of its management team, PayPortal has established itself firmly as a service provider with wide coverage in its areas of operations. Our team of uniquely skilled professionals strives to make digital payments option accessible to every customer and ensure higher profitability for them through our efficient networks and achieving economies of scale. The team brings a cumulative experience of more than five decades, expertise from national and international markets as well as a history of success in large scale financial projects.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: At PayPortal our endeavour has always been to ensure that our customers can transact with utmost ease, speed and complete assurance of safety and this has led us to adopt the blockchain technology. The concept of blockchain is bringing a revolution to the financial services industry globally and PayPortal is also evolving itself around this technology. Server decentralization, a key aspect of this technology will keep wallet data safe in case of hardware failure or hacking attacks. PayPortal has now become a pioneer amongst its peers by implementing a cross border money transfer service based on block chain to provide ease of money transfers between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. With our advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we will be ensuring the fast and safe international transfers through our own block chain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. The PPTL coins will be internationally acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A recent TechSci Research report titled “India Mobile Wallet Market Opportunities and Forecast, 2020”, projects that the mobile wallet market in India will grow to $ 6.6 billion by 2020. The increasing penetration of smart phones, a growing internet base as well as regulatory support has created conditions which are ripe for exponential growth of the mobile wallet market.  PayPortal  is supporting India’s drive towards becoming a cash-less economy and offering a secure and convenient option for a variety of financial transactions for our customers and partners. PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer. PayPortal’s centralized platform connects service providers including banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with the public through a wallet. PayPortal’s wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner.

Body: Interview of Payportal Co-founder about the project https://youtu.be/VLVM3KBGR8g  Brief of the interview : ‘The keys to brand success are self-definition, transparency, authenticity and accountability’ Alexandr Shishlov, Director and Co-founder, PayPortal Services Pvt Ltd, firmly believes in the importance of open and transparent communications with all stakeholders and in a recent tete –a –tete, he discusses about PayPortal’s foray into blockchain, the recently listed ICO, the PPTL tokens launched by the company as well as the long-term vision of the organization  Alexandr is driving the company’s vision of providing an innovative and seamless single window payment solution to its customers. He brings to PayPortal expertise from both financial services and technology industry. He highlighted how the company is leveraging the blockchain technology for strengthening overall systems and implementing a cross border money transfer service between Indian immigrants living broad and their families in home country. The technology will also help in data decentralization and thus higher data security. He also highlighted how PayPortal has differentiated itself from the competitors in the market who either focus on remittances or money transfer only. PayPortal on the other hand is the first in the Indian market to look towards introducing blockchain technology and international payment solutions.  He explains how Payportal with its advanced experience in domestic money transfers, plans to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. In the interview, Alexandr detailed the future milestones and plans of the company as well as shared important insights on how ICO is progressing.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Hey, I can say why the Payportal is different:  1. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.  2. Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Body: About our Company Payportal Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Payportal”) is a privatelyowned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry since 1996. The Payportal establishes relations between service providers and their customers by processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers in the most secure and convenient way through a Payportal wallet. The business area of our Company is Delhi where we successfully manage 80 distributors and 2300 retailers. The Payportal team has grown to over 20 people with the most in sales. During 2017 Payportal has processed around 500 million rupees in payments that was 45% higher comparing to 2016.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Hello! The Payportal platform connects Indian service providers such as banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a WALLET. A wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the owner.  Retailers use Payportal wallet to satisfy walk-in customers’ requests to make bill payments, recharges and domestic money transfers pan India in easy and secure way. On-line customers enjoy all wallet features remotely.  The platform is utilizing the advantages of personal computers and smart phones. Customers and Retailers can access wallet services at the secure web page through the standard web browsers https://mob.payportal.in or benefit IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play.

Body: Meet the Team of Superheroes powering Payportal's Journey to Success  “Great things in business are never done by one person; they’re done by a team of people.” – The quote by Steve Jobs, the maverick genius, aptly sums the importance of coming together of a good team for success of an organization. Behind every great organization is a team with an unwavering commitment to excellence, great perseverance and complete dedication towards the mission and vision of the organization.  PayPortal senior leadership team is comprised of highly experienced executives from diverse backgrounds, working towards bringing to life our mission of smart and simple, single window payment solutions. Meet our finest and most talented professionals, bringing to fore, years of expertise and experience in the financial, telecom and technology services and working towards securing a leadership position for PayPortal in the payment industry. For us they are nothing short of superheroes, coming together to take PayPortal to newer peaks of success.
