Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: I want to ask about the purpose of this project? What makes your project different between other similar projects?

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: 1. Yes we are different. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.  2. Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: 1. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.  2. Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: hi, The Payportal platform connects Indian service providers such as banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a WALLET. A wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the owner. The platform is utilizing the advantages of personal computers and smart phones, IOS and Android applications are available at App Store and Google Play.  The project's goal is to provide a solution to Customers to tackle the following challenges: regular visitings of different offices to pay monthly bills, cash collectors stealing, expensive and risky cross-border remittances, staying in a bank queues, wide geography logistics, non-professional service support and assistance, etc.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Meet the Team of Superheroes powering Payportal's Journey to Success  “Great things in business are never done by one person; they’re done by a team of people.” – The quote by Steve Jobs, the maverick genius, aptly sums the importance of coming together of a good team for success of an organization. Behind every great organization is a team with an unwavering commitment to excellence, great perseverance and complete dedication towards the mission and vision of the organization.  PayPortal senior leadership team is comprised of highly experienced executives from diverse backgrounds, working towards bringing to life our mission of smart and simple, single window payment solutions. Meet our finest and most talented professionals, bringing to fore, years of expertise and experience in the financial, telecom and technology services and working towards securing a leadership position for PayPortal in the payment industry. For us they are nothing short of superheroes, coming together to take PayPortal to newer peaks of success.  Read Full Superheroes blockbaster HERE https://irishtechnews.ie/meet-the-team-of-superheroes-powering-payportals-journey-to-success/

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Yes its legal. Actually Indian policy touches banks only, government tries to prohibit cash-fiat exchanges through bank accounts. But P2P crypto transfers are legal. In addition, The High Court of Delhi has reportedly issued a notice to the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), the Ministry of Finance, and the Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council alleging that RBI’s decision to end dealings with crypto businesses violates the constitution, local news outlet Times of India reports on April 22.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity.

Payment methods are diverse, ranging from cold hard cash to credit cards, cheques, and everything in between. Single or simple transactions are easy to process. More complex ones with large scale transactional data require a scalable and robust payment system. Payportal is a new ICO that offers a blockchain-based payment platform that connects service providers with the general public, to enable easy payment of bills and services.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity. Token distribution  Total PPTL Token supply is 20 000 000 We accept ETH 1 Token = 0,002 ETH SOFTCAP: 3000 ETH,  HARDCAP: 24 000 ETH      70% of the tokens allocated to the investors (14,500,000 PPTL)  15% for rewarding team and advisors   5% is used on Bounty program and marketing   10% for company reserve

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Payportal”) is a privately-owned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry since 1996.  The Payportal establishes a connection between service providers and their customers by processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers in the most secure and convenient way through a Payportal wallet.  The business area of our Company is Delhi where we successfully manage 80 distributors and 2300 retailers. The Payportal team has grown to over 20 people with the most in sales. During 2017 Payportal has processed around 500 million rupees in payments that was 45% higher comparing to 2016.

Body: Hi! Tell us about the business model

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market.  Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi.  Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area.   Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc.  Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform.  Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority.

Author: ILTVSasha
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Tell us about Blockchain

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.   Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.   Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.   All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities.     Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Payportal”) is a privately-owned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry since 1996.  The Payportal establishes a connection between service providers and their customers by processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers in the most secure and convenient way through a Payportal wallet.  The business area of our Company is Delhi where we successfully manage 80 distributors and 2300 retailers. The Payportal team has grown to over 20 people with the most in sales. During 2017 Payportal has processed around 500 million rupees in payments that was 45% higher comparing to 2016.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform. Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack. Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction. All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. New retailer creation. Retailer shifts to another distributor. Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. Distributor lending facilities.  Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: New ADVISOR has joined the Payportal team.  Michael E. Bryant, MA, MBA, CPA, CBE  Michael is the CEO of Blockchain Ventures International, CEO of ICO Management Ltd, CEO & Publisher of “Blockchain Daily News” (www.blockchainChimp.com), Executive Member of The Blockchain Council, and President of Bryant Trust Ltd.  He additionally serves as the Chairman of the Advisory Boards for the DIGITAL CURRENSY (DCC) ICO, the GREEK FOOD CORRIDORS (GFC) ICO, the CARGO COIN (CRGO) ICO, and the Decibels (DCBL) ICO, as well as an Advisory Board member for the IPCHAIN Database (IP) ICO, The DOUBLE LAND GAME ICO, the LIGHTCASH ICO, and the BBILLER ICO.  Michael serves as an Adjunct Professor of “International Accounting” and “International Corporate Finance” in the Masters in International Business program at Moscow’s Higher School of Economics, and as a guest lecturer on Blockchain Technology and Cryptocurrencies at the Moscow University of Finance & Law (MFUA).  In addition to acquiring eleven late stage companies during his career, with revenues ranging from $2 million to $120 million, Michael was the founder of six startup companies, with activities ranging from 4-D Printing and online mining supply, to Education & Training and Musician Promotion. He is a Certified Public Accountant (CPA), and a Certified Blockchain Expert (CBE).  Michael began his career in 1982 with a BSc. in Finance & Accounting from the University of South Carolina, after serving as a White House Intern in the Ronald Reagan administration. During his career he furthered his education by earning a MBA in International Business from Georgia State University, and a MA in International Relations from The Fletcher School of Law & Diplomacy at Harvard University and Tufts University.  https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelebryant/

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In the current system of cross-border payments, there are two key issues, which are the costs of transfers are very high, with intermediaries charging a steep fee and the time taken by transactions which are on average at least two to three business days. This is why PayPortal is leveraging the blockchain technology for implementing a cross border money transfer service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country.  With its advanced expertise in domestic money transfers, PayPortal plans to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin.  The PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: As per Harvard Business Review blog, around 45% of financial intermediaries, such as payment networks, stock exchanges, and money transfer services, suffer from economic crime every year. Blockchain technology provides a level of security which was not available so far.  This is because in this technology, all transactions and balances get updated to all users in the network in a crypted format and it is virtually impossible to manipulate or tamper with them. Unlike banks, where the data is centrally stored and can be hacked, use of blockchain based platform will ensure zero infiltration since it requires simultaneous access to every single computer on the network by any hacker for a successful hacking attack.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Thanks, actually russian people are welcomed all over the World.  Payportal wallet is used by customers every day, they pay bills, recharge TV, mobile phones, they buy bus and train tickets and do many other things. Indians do not addict to foreign currencies and use local rupees everywhere,  it is difficult to find an Exchange on the street, because locals do not use it.  Indians in most of the cases will never take foreign currency as a payment, if dont believe, please try with any merchant. Why I am telling about this, because using fiat - USD, EUR, etc are much more convenient then ETH or BTC, and nevertheless people avoid it. Therefore if someone wants to send money abroad he will use the black market offer when he could give cash rupees and without questions an agent will organize money delivery in another country to a receiver also in cash. But the cost is high. Among 1,2 billion people only few can use ETH OR BTC, but using retailer services are widespread, and Payportal can provide all services in one wallet in ruppees.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer. PayPortal’s centralized platform connects service providers including banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a wallet. The PayPortal wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner.  To further develop the existing PayPortal platforms, the developers have adopted the blockchain technology. Adoption of the technology will ensure that the trusted platform of PayPortal can help its customers embrace the blockchain technology for their day to day transactions.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In the current system of cross-border payments, there are two key issues, which are the costs of transfers are very high, with intermediaries charging a steep fee and the time taken by transactions which are on average at least two to three business days. This is why PayPortal is leveraging the blockchain technology for implementing a cross border money transfer service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country.  With its advanced expertise in domestic money transfers, PayPortal plans to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin.  The PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: In the system adopted by PayPortal, distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors will buy tokens in the OTC (over the counter) market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and PayPortal wallet number of a receiver. The PPTL value will be credited automatically to the wallet owner who continues to use PayPortal financial services.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Thanks, there are many companies doind similar business, but different in the same time. Each company has own focus. THe biggest is PayTM - almost a bank, but doing more retail business neither Bills and money transfers.  Yes we are different. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.   Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.   All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities.      Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Author: Rusha1
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: So what is the difference between PayPortal and other competitor?

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Thanks, Yes we are different. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: IN addition to previous post: Payportal has all services available in one wallet, while most of the competitors are focused on either recharges or domestic money transfers. Bill payments across India become available due to implementation of Bharat Bill Payment System by the RBI that requires complex integration and compliance with the requirements that Payportal has been finalizing. Cross-border money transfers will be unique as our competitors do not provide such services. Payportal is more customers oriented in terms of quality and has IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play while some competitors use only SIM based technologies or web based interfaces.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: How to use Blockchain ?

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The use of blockchain technologies is one of the most important tasks for the further successful development of the platform.   Server decentralization will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  Implementing a cross border money transfers service between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. As the Payportal has advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we plan to realize this part of the project based on the own blockchain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. PPTL coins will be acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.   All fees will be applicable in PPTL coins: 1) Monthly subscription to Payportal services (Bharat Bill Payment system, Aadhaar Enabled Payment System) for retailers and distributors. 2) New retailer creation. 3) Retailer shifts to another distributor. 4) Emergency cash collection service that can be ordered by a retailer. 5) Distributor lending facilities.      Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed.

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give us a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets (Maharashtra, Rajasthan, etc.), pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand our development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Our PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: India: Delhi High Court Seeks Response From Central Bank On Recent Crypto Ban, Report Says  The High Court of Delhi has reportedly issued a notice to the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), the Ministry of Finance, and the Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council alleging that RBI’s decision to end dealings with crypto businesses violates the constitution, local news outlet Times of India reports today, April 22.  The High Court’s notice is reportedly in response to a claim filed by crypto company Kali Digital last week. After the RBI released a circular on April 5 stating that they would no longer provide services to a person or a business that deals in cryptocurrency, an online petition to reverse the ban was started, gaining over 43,000 signatures by press time.  Kali Digital, which runs the crypto exchange CoinRecoil, set to be launched in August 2018, filed an official claim on April 16, stating that RBI’s circular violates constitutional Articles 19 (1) (g) – allowing citizens the right to any occupation, trade, or business – and Article 14 – prohibiting  discrimination between equals. The High Court of Delhi’s notice, issued by Judges S. Ravindra Bhat and A. K. Chawla, asks for a response from the three parties involved by May 24.  read the full news https://cointelegraph.com/news/india-delhi-high-court-seeks-response-from-central-bank-on-recent-crypto-ban-report-says

Author: BountyTwo
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: When you are considering investing in ICO you want to find out everything about the project and the team. Sometimes, it looks suspicious when a lot of celebrities are advertising ICO or even in the team of developers. It’s usually not worth trusting. Payportal ICO doesn’t include any celebrities or lots of people, but every one of them are trustworthy hardworking people, who work for the idea and they work for the changes. So, let’s meet the team. Alexandr Shishlov Director and Co-Founder. Alexandr brings to Payportal a long history in both financial services and technology. He has more than 20 years’ experience in payment systems development and project management. Prior to founding Payportal, he served as a department head of Kazakhstan Interbank Settlement Center of the National Bank of Kazakhstan, a payment system operator of the country. He was managed the following projects from its startups: SWIFT Service Bureau for Kazakhstan banks, Retail payment system for recharges and bill payments. He successfully coordinated the CISPI World Bank project – payment and securities settlement system Initiative for the CIS countries and participated in the Committee on Payments and Settlements System of the Bank for International Settlements task force on General guidance for the Development of Payment systems. Alexandr successfully organized and run from the scratch several different private companies in fintech area. Some of them were successfully sold with big margin. Alexandr has a bachelor’s degree in engineering from Kazakhstan National Technical University and Master of Business Administration (MBA) degree from Kazakhstan Institute of Management, Economics & Strategic Research (KIMEP). Additionally, he has payment system certificates from Bank of France and Bank of England. As you can see, Alexandr came to Payportal team with great experience and great baggage of knowledge, so he can introduce innovative technologies in payment system of India. https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexandr-shishlov-39833415a Alok Yadav Director Alok has had a distinguished career spanning the Education, Telecom and Service Industry and brings in extensive experience in Operations, Liaising and Customer Service. Alok’s proven track record includes complete operational management and backend technology development aligning with business need. He is an analytical and clear thinker with high commercial orientation and strong customer focus. Alok has been working with Payportal since 2012; and has been responsible for end to end operational management. He has also brought to fore his strategic expertise and successfully 16 handled responsibilities of various departments in the organization. He is a proactive team builder who excels in strategic planning, problem solving and innovative process improvement. Prior to joining Payportal, Mr. Yadav was Director, English Sparta Educational Services (P) Ltd where he was instrumental in bringing about a turnaround in the organization and achieving operational goals. Alok graduated from Agra University. Alok knows the payment system of India from inside, since he was working for years in this system. He knows how to practically implement the innovative payment system. https://www.linkedin.com/in/alok-yadav-38120614b/ This is a small part of the team that is working for Payportal project, and there are more and more great people working on creating bright future.

Author: irentys
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal created a unique platdorm for India that make a the payment of bills easier for the citizens. Their goal is to spread and develop the platform around the country, and make changes in the country. They have started as a group of enthusiastic people, and now they created the platform, started the ICO and have a great plans for the future.  The Payportal centralized platform connects Indian service providers like banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a wallet. Payportal wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner. It only takes a few seconds to set up a wallet and two factors authentication process ensures that our customer is exactly the person who owns the wallet.  A retailer does not need to think anymore about separate handsets, lack of service providers and long waiting time for collection service. The multiple possibilities exist for a wallet top up, there are: payment cards transfers, Netbanking, wire transfers to the Payportal bank account. In addition, our Company negotiates the cash collection services with the nearest distributor and allows depositing cash into Company bank account at the biggest Indian bank branches. Finalizing the transaction within few seconds, making easy search in transaction history, accessing the electronic news desk, participating in bonus programs, receiving SMS confirmation by a customer and many other features make the Payportal wallet popular. Now, the only retailer has to think about is to increase the number of customers and provide a quality service. The platform is utilizing the advantages of personal computers and smart phones. The Payportal platform is available on secure web page (mob.payportal.in) that has been designed for 6 personal computers and mobile web. Smart phone users can benefit from IOS and Android applications available at App Store and Google Play. In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market. Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi. Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area. Distributors and retailers mostly represent different shops that can be found on almost every busy street in India. They sell electronic gadgets, mobile phones and all kinds of mobile phone accessories such as mobile cases, flip covers, earphones, etc. Both distributors and retailers are involved into provision of customer service like mobile and DTH recharges, utility bill payments, domestic money transfers through Payportal platform. Surely, the Payportal is watching Indian society had benefited from low internet tariffs and affordable smart phones, and introduced Android and IOS mobile applications for increasing on-line customers. Development of this market segment is our priority.  It’s always your choice either to take part in ICO, but Payportal is totally worth it, and you will never regret it. You can help developing something innovative and important for the whole country.

Author: BountyTwo
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal is a team that is not afraid of challenges and always ready to risk. They want to try something new, they move forward together with the world, they try new technologies. And this Payportal ICO is a great challenge and the great opportunity to develop and to create brand new system, that will make the life of people in India easier. In India, people from the streets trust more a person in a small street shop who is able to make a mobile recharge or pay a bill in front of a customer. The habit comes from the deep of history when people relations in India were based on trust. Retailer shops in most of the cases are small private entrepreneurships, run by its owners. Sometimes they are even inherited from father to the son, or they are run by families. Recharges and mobile bill payments usually have been offered by mobile operators in a way of provision a special prepaid SIM card that can be used by a retailer to initiate the sms message to some special number with the amount of a recharge and a customer mobile number. The sim card requires a positive balance to cover outgoing recharges and blocks if there are no funds left. Usually retailers have up to ten handsets available for recharges to different mobile or TV operators. If a retailer is run out of balance at one or few sim cards he is awaiting the collection service from particular mobile operator team and is not able to service its customers. Money on the sim cards are not transferrable to other sim cards. Bill payments are currently not interoperable and retailers have had to sign up with individual utility providers to facilitate payments that are almost impossible due to difficult logistics, no people resources to manage the task, lack of financial and IT knowledge. The top 10 electricity companies, for example, have just 2000 cash collections centers in India. Cross border remittances have much space for improvement as well. Besides external pressures, Indian policies toward migrants like the introduction of a tax on conversion of remittances, extra regularization of foreign recruiting markets, also cause an existence of black market schemes. For example “telephone channel” that is very expensive and insecure when a remitter brings money in cash to a person (agent) who by telephone requests his friend in India to provide the negotiated amount in local Indian currency to a beneficiary. That’s the things Payportal team wants to change, they are enthusiastic and they really believe in what they do, so with the investments they can make it possible, and you will see that in few years everything can be totally different than now in India. If you are interested you are free to participate in Payportal ICO.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Samson Owiti Cryptotrader, Crypto investor, Blockchain business expert  ABOUT THE PAYPORTAL ICO  PAYPORTAL is a processing platform which creates relations between service providers  and their customers by processing on-line charges, bill payments  and domestic money transfers in the most secure and convenient manner  PROS:  Faster transactions: The use of the platform enables the user to make easy and faster transactions  within a few seconds, making it easy to search transaction history,accessing electronic news  desk which increases the numbers of  customers and provides a quality service User-friendly: The users take a few seconds to set up  a wallet which enables them to enjoy a variety of services within the wallet  i.e. net banking, wire transfer hence improving the service delivery  The platform is easily accessible to  all smart phone users as its well developed mobile application supported by Android and IOS is readily available in Play store and Google Play where the users can install in their smart phones to enjoy the platform services Security: The platform ensures that the users data is fully protected  and  the two- factor authentication ensures that the customers are exactly the persons who own the wallets hence preventing any possible losses due to hacking The use of PPTL token  enables the users easily  access the platform services as it exchangeable with fiat and other crypto currencies  making the project to be used across the globe  The involved team has a good and related experience and skills led by the CEO  Alexander Shishlov who has managed different payment systems  The platform white paper clearly highlights the need for the project in improving the quality of services to the customers through the portal wallets promoting its use.  CONS:  The Payportal token doesn’t entitle the users to any equity, governance, voting or control over the management of the platform The newly adopted regulations and policies may adversely affect the development of the PPTL coins The management team involved are fewer  SUGGESTIONS:  The token holders should be given more powers and control the platform decisions and entitled to profit share of the project More management team members should be involved in the platform NOTE:  The platform enables the customers to easily access various quality services through the pay portal wallet hence eliminating the exploitative services from the retailers which are expensive. Author: Rusha1
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal project is an ambitious team that plans to change the bill payment and money transfer system in India. Now they are working in Deli, but they are planning to expand to the whole country. But what is behind all this and where these ideas came from? Let’s discover! According to the World Bank data, India, with a population of more than 1.2 billion, is the world’s largest democracy. Over the past decade, the country’s integration into the global economy has been accompanied by economic growth. Annual GDP growth is expected at 7.0% in FY18 and inflation remained stable. India remains the world’s leading recipient of international personal remittances, claiming 10.9% of global inflows, followed by China (10.6%) and Philippines (5.4%). Total remittance inflow to India was $62 billion in 2016. The Indian telecom sector has the second largest subscriber base and internet subscribers in the world. In the last two decades it has transformed lives, and many sectors of industry and economy from healthcare to financial services. Its growth is inextricably linked to mobile services as a fundamental requirement for business. The users have been empowered from mere passive consumers to active participants and have benefited from low tariffs, availability of affordable smart phones and an evolving Information and communications technology infrastructure. It is at the core of the Government’s Digital India vision. According to the Boston Consulting Group report: Bill payments (mobile and utility bills) show large potential of tectonic shifts to digital payments. Around 30 billion bills worth USD 103 billion are generated every year, of which, 70 percent are paid in cash. Remittance / fund transfer: Peer to peer transfers or remittances will continue to be an important use-case for digital payment instruments. Digital payment instruments like wallets and assisted payment service providers help urban migrants send money home without the need for queues etc. as compared to banks. Thus, the adoption of digital payment instruments for fund transfers is expected to grow exponentially. Payportal Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Payportal”) is a privately owned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry since 1996. The Payportal establishes relations between service providers and their customers by processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers in the most secure and convenient way through a Payportal wallet. The business area of our Company is Delhi where we successfully manage 80 distributors and 2300 retailers. The Payportal team has grown to over 20 people with the most in sales. During 2017 Payportal has processed around 500 million rupees in payments that was 45% higher comparing to 2016. The Payportal team is aimed to success, they started and they don’t want to stop where they are, and with the help of investors, they can get to their aims faster and they can put new goals ahead of them.

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: PayPortal: Transforming the financial landscape through smart easy and secure payment solutions  A recent TechSci Research report titled “India Mobile Wallet Market Opportunities and Forecast, 2020”, projects that the mobile wallet market in India will grow to US$ 6.6 billion by 2020. The increasing penetration of smart phones, a growing internet base as well as regulatory support has created conditions which are ripe for exponential growth of the mobile wallet market.  PayPortal Services (P) Limited is supporting India’s drive towards becoming cash-less economy and offering a secure and convenient option for a variety of financial transactions for our customers and partners.  PayPortal is a privately-owned company, established under the Indian laws in 2011 by experts with more than two decades of experience in the international payment services industry. It is a payment solution company with expertise in mobile recharges, utility bill payments and money transfer. PayPortal’s centralized platform connects service providers including banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a wallet. PayPortal wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner.  PayPortal is making financial transactions easier and smoother by ensuring quick and safe recharges, money transfers and payments. We are present through point of sale terminals, web as well as mobile app for the ease and financial convenience of our customers and partners.  Our mission is to offer top-notch electronic payment solutions to our customers across the value chain. We consistently work towards making a difference in the daily life of our end users by providing seamless services, ease of use through a single window payment option and complete customer satisfaction.  Leveraging the deep experience in banking, payments processing, telecom and information technology of its management team, PayPortal has established itself firmly as a service provider with wide coverage in its areas of operations. Our team of uniquely skilled professionals strives to make digital payments option accessible to every customer and ensure higher profitability for them through our efficient networks and achieving economies of scale. The team brings a cumulative experience of more than five decades, expertise from national and international markets as well as a history of success in large scale financial projects.  At PayPortal our endeavour has always been to ensure that our customers can transact with utmost ease, speed and complete assurance of safety and this has led us to adoption of the blockchain technology. The concept of blockchain is bringing a revolution to the financial services industry globally and PayPortal is also evolving itself around this technology. Server decentralization, a key aspect of this technology will keep wallets data safe in case of hardware failure or hackers attack.  PayPortal has now become a pioneer amongst its peers by implementing a cross border money transfer service based on block chain to provide ease of money transfers between Indian migrants living abroad and their families in home country. With our advanced experience in domestic money transfers, we will be ensuring the fast and safe international transfers through our own block chain and crypto currency PPTL Coin. The PPTL coins will be internationally acceptable as a means of payment and will be convertible into Indian rupees for the final leg of transaction.  Our company operates on bedrock of    innovation, long term partnerships and customer focus; leveraging our expertise and experience to ensure the success of the entire system comprising of  operators, consumers, merchants and dealer networks, financial institutions and infrastructure providers. We work towards creating a win-win for all our stakeholders and maximize benefits for them through decreased transaction costs, reduced risks in the payments chain and dramatically reduced payment time.

Body: Payportal project is very perspective and has lots of advantages. The Roadmap is really impressive and if everything will go as planned for them than they will turn the system of financial services upside down in India. Payportal’s goal is to be in India TOP 3 companies providing financial services to customers pan India. Q2 2018 Finalizing an integration with Bharat Bill Payment System (BBPS) Integration with Bharat Bill Payment System will extend access to all utility bills, issued by Indian companies across the country. Customers will be able to fetch own bills through Payportal platform and timely pay bills on-line or through retailers. Q3 2018 Releasing new version of IOS and Android applications with DMT Domestic money transfer service is available at the moment on web based solutions of the platform and is required to be extended to smart phones applications that will increase the number of wallet usage by on-line customers. Q3 2018 Increasing the sales efforts for the area of Delhi Promotion of new BBPS services like electricity, gas and water among the biggest distributors and retailers in the market. Find leads for new distributorship. Q4 2018 Advertising of Payportal wallet Running internet advertising campaign to attract and extend on-line Payportal wallet users. Q4 2018 Development of own blockchain Development and implementation of blockchain technologies for decentralization of data, crossborder money transfer service and fees collection. Q1 2019 Geographical expansion to the new areas close to Delhi Increasing the sales team, creating new distributors and retailers in new areas, promoting Q2 2018 Finalizing an integration with Bharat Bill Payment System (BBPS) Q3 2018 Releasing new version of IOS and Android applications with DMT •Increasing the sales efforts for the area of Delhi Q4 2018 Development of own blockchain, Advertising of Payportal wallet Q1 2019 Geographical expansion to the new areas close to Delhi (Faridabad, Ghaziabad and Noida) Q2 2019 Developing and implementing loyalty program for retailers and distributors Q4 2019 Geographical expansion to TOP 3 largest Indian cities and surrounding areas (Mumbai, Bangalore, Pune or Jaipur, Faridabad, Ghaziabad and Noida) Payportal platform among retailers. Q2 2019 Developing and implementing loyalty program for retailers and distributors Implementing a loyalty program, that will motivate retailers to increase sales. Distributors in turn, will improve the service quality and the number of new retailers. Additionally, our Company will introduce the number of own services to be used by retailers and distributors for redemption of loyal bonuses and receiving extra value. Q4 2019 Geographical expansion to TOP 3 largest Indian cities and surrounding areas (Mumbai, Bangalore, Pune or Jaipur). Registration and opening new offices. Creation networks of distributors and retailers. Promotion of Payportal services. Creating co-branded payment products with banks. As you can see, Payportal project has great plans for the future, and they know how to fulfill it, but they need investment as a main part of this plan. Think about it, it worth a try!

Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Yes we are different. Our competitors mostly focus on a particular service either mobile recharges and TV bills, or domestic money transfers or railway/bus tickets. Payportal provides all this services on a single platform. Bill payments PAN India project has been started by the RBI at the beginning of 2018, and Payportal will be one of the first in the market with this services available, also access criteria will not allow many companies to participate. More than that, cross border money transfers project is new on the market. Most of the competitors does not have IOS and Android apps, or those not much popular among retailers and people due to poor usability. Our platform is the best, according to the market feedback.

Author: Rusha1
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal is a very perspective project that is planning to gradually develop the way of money transferring and paying bills in India. But all the startups need supports. That’s why we created PPTL tokens. A key objective for Payportal is to rise sufficient capital to execute our plans. The strong cash position will give Payportal a clear runaway to acquire new customers, expand within the current area of Delhi and NCR and other geographic markets, pursue new licensing deals, develop new technologies, expand the development resources and continue adding significant innovations to our wallet technology. Their PPTL Token (PPTL) is an ERC20 UTILITY token, and aims to provide the development of the Payportal platform. PPTL can also be seen as a loyalty token allowing investors to show their affiliation with and support of the project. It does not represent equity. Here are some numbers and info about the tokens, that Payportal offers. Total PPTL Token supply is 20 000 000 They can be purchased with ETH 1 Token = 0,002 ETH SOFTCAP: 3000 ETH, HARDCAP: 24 000 ETH This is how the tokens will be distributed. 70% of the tokens allocated to the investors (14,500,000 PPTL), 15% for rewarding team and advisors, 5% is used on Bounty program and marketing, 10% for company reserve. That’s how the sale will go Early investors are rewarded and only limited tokens available to avoid low average price. Private sale – starts at April 16, 2018 During this phase 2,000,000 PPTL Tokens are available with 30% Bonus + Extra bonus. Extra bonus is negotiable and depends on the investment amount. The initial period for the Private sale lasts until May 06, 2018 at midnight CET. The Public Pre-sale dates will be announced at the end of this period or immediately if all tokens from this phase have been sold. Private sale Minimum transaction limit = 100 ETH. ICO dates will be announced after private sale stage. ICO lasts until July 15, 2018 at midnight CET and consist of three stages offering PPTL Tokens with a decreasing bonus. 2,000,000 tokens are available in the final stage with no bonus applicable. Tokens that were not allocated in the Pre ICO will be added to the ICO pool. Unsold tokens during the ICO will be burned. PPTL tokens will be non transferable until the end of the ICO. So, after all the investments are made there is going to be another stage of work for Payportal team. After burning unsold tokens, the Payportal will issue its own crypto currency called PPTL coin (PPTL) in equivalent of existing Payportal Tokens at the end of the ICO. Payportal Token holders will be able to exchange Payportal Tokens for PPTL coins at the rate: 1 Payportal Token = 1 PPTL coin. PPTL coins, later, will be listed on several stock exchanges. Payportal is a pretty reliable project, with the great reviews and prosperous plans, check it out and maybe you will find it interesting for you.

Author: irentys
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Payportal gathered together a team of great professionals who are dedicated to their work and they know their field as a back of their hand. They are hardworking team who are aimed to succeed. They have international team which knows how it’s working in different countries and they can share the experience with each other, as well as gain some experience while working for the project that can change the whole country, and it’s a small step to make small changes in the world. Payportal ICO also has an experienced team of advisors that will bring ICO Payportal to the great success. First advisor presented is Simon Cocking. Senior Editor at Irish Tech News - with over 710,000 unique monthly views, Editor in Chief at CryptoCoinNews, and freelances for Sunday Business Post, Irish Times, Southern Star, IBM, G+D, and others. Simon is a top ranked member of the ‘People of Blockchain’ (currently ranked at #1 / 18,000). He is also a business mentor and advisor working with 100+ successful ICOs to date. He also been named many global Twitter influencer lists in the last 12 months. He is an accomplished public speaker at events including TEDx, Web Summit, Dublin Tech Summit, and overseas in Dubai, Singapore, Moscow, Tel Aviv, Madrid, Tbilisi, Riga, Porto, Dublin and Helsinki in the last 12 months. Simon has been based in Ireland for over 22 years and has cofounded or founded seven successful companies. Simon is a really experienced and influential person, who help only ICOs that he believes in, and when he’s not scared to even invest his personal money into it. Lots of people trust him, and he’s worth to trust! He never advises bad things. Next one is Daniel Heller. Regulatory Affairs Daniel has been associated with the Peterson Institute for International Economics since January 2017 as a visiting fellow. Before joining the Institute, he was head of financial stability at the Swiss National Bank, head of the Secretariat of the Committee on Payment and Settlement Systems at the Bank for International Settlements, and executive director for Switzerland, Poland, Serbia, Azerbaijan, and four Central Asian republics at the International Monetary Fund. Daniel received his PhD from the University of Bern and was a research fellow at Stanford University. His current research focuses on the impact of emerging digital technologies such as blockchain on the financial sector, financial stability, and central banking. Daniel is a financial advisor of Payportal ICO. He helps Payportal team to organize and use wisely the financial assets that they have and, hopefully, they receive. He is one of the best in his field. The last, but not the least is Irina Travina A Chairman of Russian software developers’ Association “SibAcademSoft”. A member of Supervisory and Expert Council of the «Technopark of Novosibirsk Academgorodok». A member of strategic planning group of the Novosibirsk State University. A member of the Coordinating Council on Information Resources, Technologies and Communication at the International Association “Siberian Accord” Co-founder of the internationally known developer company of computer games and simulators «SoftLab-NSK» LLP. Computer games Hard Truck, Hard Truck-2 and Hard Truck-3 according to the Next Generation web portal rating in 2006 become the first Russian project in the top 100 best selling games of the XXI century. The company develops and produces own solutions for automation of TV, cable and internet broadcasting. More than 2500 TV studios and internet providers from Russia and abroad have selected the solutions for Digital TV. She is a great software developer, that helps Payportal to develop the app and the website, and teach their team new software techniques and tricks.

Author: holos119
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: When you participate in ICO there are always a lot of benefits as well as a lot of risks. But if you would participate in Payportal ICO, you won’t regret it. You can take part in the world-changing experience. They do really great and hard work, in order to make India better and to help their country develop faster and more efficient. There are a lot of benefits in participation in Payportl ICO. Potential Appreciation in Value. The potential for increased profit over time and growing demand from retailers and distributors as a result of redemption of loyalty bonuses, fees, cross-border money transfers provides the basis for potential value appreciation over time. Provision of additional services based on the PPTL coins to retailers and on-line wallet users will increase its total demand. Transfers We expect that PPTL coins will be exchangeable for fiat currencies and other cryptocurrencies. Also, the great benefit is helping people and making the country grow and prosper. It’s really important to believe in the project that you are taking part in. Every person can take part in changing the country. There is another side of every ICO, there are a lot of risks, but there are a lot of risks in the life, so it’s not very dangerous. A purchase of PPTL tokens involves some degree of risk. Participation in token offerings involves a high degree of risk. Financial and operating risks confronting financial and technology companies may be significant. The financial and payment processing industries are highly competitive and the percentage of companies that survive and prosper may be limited. Unexpected problems in the areas of product development, marketing, financing and general management, among others, that cannot be solved may arise. General risks associated with the business of Payportal. Payportal proposes to offer highly complex services and products and faces competition that may result in low market share and/or profitability. Payportal expects the marketplace to continue to be highly competitive as new products develop, industry standards become well known and other competitors attempt to enter these markets. Some competitors may have longer operating histories, and larger customer bases and significantly greater financial, sales and marketing, manufacturing, distribution, technical and other capabilities than Payportal. These competitors may be able to adapt more quickly to new or emerging technological requirements and changes in customer and/or regulatory requirements. They may also be able to devote greater resources to the promotion and sale of their products and services. Competition from newly established competitors may also enter the marketplace and further materially adversely affect Payportal. You may see that there are pros and cons in participating in Payportal ICO. But there is also a great team that works for Payportal, they are dedicated and they truly believe in the project, that they are working for.

Author: ole88_89
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: How Payportal can change India? People in India from the streets trust more a person in a small street shop who is able to make a mobile recharge or pay a bill in front of a customer. The habit comes from the deep of history when people relations in India were based on trust and helping each other. Retailer shops in most of the cases are small private shops, that is run by its owners. Recharges and mobile bill payments usually have been offered by mobile operators in a way of provision a special prepaid SIM card that can be used by a retailer to initiate the sms message to some special number with the amount of a recharge and a customer mobile number. The sim card requires a positive balance to cover outgoing recharges and blocks if there are no funds left. Usually retailers have up to ten handsets available for recharges to different mobile or TV operators. If a retailer is run out of balance at one or few sim cards he is awaiting the collection service from particular mobile operator team and is not able to service its customers. Money on the sim cards are not transferrable to other sim cards. In general Payportal establish relationships with various mobile, DTH, utility operators, banks and manages connections for receiving and processing on-line recharges, bill payments and domestic money transfers to customers’ bank accounts from the market. Payportal has appointed its distributors in various part of Delhi. Distributors in their turn deal with their retailers appointed independently or by Payportal in the designated area. The Payportal centralized platform connects Indian service providers like banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companies with public through a wallet. Payportal wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner. It only takes a few seconds to set up a wallet and two factors authentication process ensures that our customer is exactly the person who owns the wallet. A retailer does not need to think anymore about separate handsets, lack of service providers and long waiting time for collection service. The multiple possibilities exist for a wallet top up, there are: payment cards transfers, Netbanking, wire transfers to the Payportal bank account. In addition, our Company negotiates the cash collection services with the nearest distributor and allows depositing cash into Company bank account at the biggest Indian bank branches. They work for people and for the country. They are going step by step to their goal. They really want to change the way of life and the way of thinking of the country. When you want to make changes – challenge yourself, place goals, work on your failures and then the result will totally worth it. And that is the answer – that’s how Payportal can change India!

Author: BountyTwo
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: The Payportal platform always making new goals and challenge themselves. They work hard to create and develop new technologies, to introduce new products to the market. The biggest improvement lately was starting of using the blockchain technology. They use it for various reasons, but it definitely brought the platdorm to the new level. Blockchain will be used for decentralization of the platform, so it will be more protected and as a result there will be less chances for hacker attacks and for the platform failure. Also, it is very important for implementing a cross-border payment system, so the people who left India can help their families in their own country, and the Indian families can help their relatives abroad. Doesn’t it sound good? But there is something even more. Payplatform creators and developers want to introduce their tokens into the platform. It means that with PPTL tokens people will be able to pay the bills and buy services. It’s is a very big step forward. If all their plans will succeed in the nearest future we will meet the totally new and innovative platform, that can totally change the way of payments and money transfers in India. Trust me it’s worth it. They also plan to open new retailer, with the chain of shops, where people can buy services, pay bills, and withdraw cash from their wallets. Distributors will play the major role in PPTL coin transfers. Distributors buy tokens in the OTC market or crypto exchanges and make a smart contract transfer to the Company wallet. The transaction contains the value and Payportal wallet number of a receiver. Automatically PPTL value will be credited to a wallet owner who continues to use Payportal financial services. Upon expiration of the PPTL coins on a Payportal wallet, the services will be postponed. The most important part of this plan is to raise the proper capital to make their plans into reality, and to create the whole infrastructure that will change the country. They accept ETH for buying PPTL tokens. It is a great step forward for the development of payments in India and who knows? Maybe more countries will use their system to develop the payment systems in the world. They try to implement new services for the old school tax payment and money transfer pattrerns. Author: Borkin
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors
Body: Today I am going to tell you about my thought about Payportal. They are the Indian-based company which specializes in payment processing and making payments easier and more comfortable. Payportal Services Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Payportal”) is a privately-owned company that has been established in 2011 under the laws of India by international experts who have been in the payment services industry since 1996. Our mail office is situated in Dehli and their team is more than 20 dedicated people who work for the best results. They have a big team of great people who work for the best results. They try to make impossible possible and we are always in a search of the new ideas and ways to improve their work and the platform. India is one of the fastest growing countries in terms of technical development, and company is a part of it. Their main goal is to make the bill payments easier for the average people. They want to show people that paying bills is not standing in lines, waiting for the tired cashier to process their payment. Everything can be much easier. Few clicks on a smartphone – and all of the bills are paid. Nowadays people are going to small shops or to the banks to pay their bills, they wait in lines for ages, just to pay for the mobile phone or electricity- we will change it in the nearest future with your help. The Payportal is a centralized platform that connects Indian service providers like banks, mobile operators, digital TV operators and utility companieswith public through a wallet. Payportal wallet number is linked to a mobile number of the wallet’s owner. It is very easy to create and to use this wallet, but the possibilities are enormous. You can pay for your TV, mobile phone, all the utility bills in few clicks, you don’t even have to go outside – all we need is to have money in your wallet and to have internet connection. In our times when we are always running, always busy – it is a best solution to save our precious time. It is available as a mobile app, as well as the secure web page, so if our phone is not working or not charged – you can still easily pay everything with browser.  Also, platform has a money transfer function – it means that if your family abroad, or you need to help your family or just pay for something – you can easily use service. It smart, convenient and time-saving. They also use a blockchain technology to make their platform more secure and easier to use. As for today, blockchain technology is the most reliable technology in the world.  What do you think? Is it useful?

Author: Payportal
Title: [PPTL] Payportal ICO [BIG BONUS] +SHAREHOLDING Option for BIG Investors

For example, if we take 1% from the total inward remittances to India it will be equal 62 millions USD in a year that we could expect to receive through Payportal platform. As we plan to use PPTL coins as means of payment, the supply of coins will face a deficit already in 3 months time. More than that, growing number of retailers (for example 30'000) will require monthly supply approx 1 million PPTL coins. Therefore Holders will benefit from selling and buying PPTL coins. Payportal will use own reserves only in case of the last resourt.
